General.Name: Da Lue International Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Da Lue International Holding Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, provides various wedding services in China. The company offers wedding banquet and planning services, conference services, and photo and video services, as well as rents and sells clothing and flowers. It is also involved in the operation of hotels and clubs; and real estate and investment business. In addition, the company provides catering and catering management, technical consultation, and other services, as well as technology development in the field of network technology. Its brand portfolio includes Victoria Wedding Club, Pujue Hotel,Vienna Hotel, and Hotel Pravo. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: The Grand Pavilion Commercial Centre, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, KY1-1208
